title: Annapolis Convention
description: Delegates from five states meet to discuss interstate trade barriers. The low turnout highlights the weakness of the Articles of Confederation.

title: The Connecticut Compromise
description: Sherman and Ellsworth propose a bicameral legislature with dual representation systems. This saved the Convention from collapse.

title: Constitution Signed
description: The Constitutional Convention concludes. 39 delegates sign the document, sending it to the states for ratification.
